definition: stage name (of an actor or actress)
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: His stage name stands for "Ladies Love Cool James."
sentences.chinese: 他的艺名代表着“女士钟爱酷詹姆斯”。

sentences.english: He used screen name Deepak for the Telugu movies.
sentences.chinese: 他的艺名迪帕克来自于泰卢固语电影。

sentences.english: The actress appeared under a false name.
sentences.chinese: 这名女演员用艺名演出。

sentences.english: He took his stage name from the 1983 film Scarface.
sentences.chinese: 他从1983年电影疤面煞星他的艺名。

sentences.english: Maodi is his stage name. His Chinese name is Qiu Yucheng.
sentences.chinese: 毛弟是他的艺名，他到中文名字叫邱祤橙。

sentences.english: The actor is better known by his professional name.
sentences.chinese: 那位演员的艺名更为人们所知。

definition: pet name for a child/childhood name
to name/to christen/to take a name
refined appelation/(humor) sb's elegant monicker/(hon.) your esteemed name
to make one's first public performance (of an entertainer etc)/to start one's career
dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)
to win instant success (idiom)/to become an instant hit
